1: Starlight Dreams. A golden marquee glows. Evelyn Starling locks eyes with Marcus Kane beneath velvet ropes and vintage cars.
3: Neon Horizon. Caelan Voss rockets a light bike through a vector highway. Rival headlights close in as skyscrapers glow, grid blue.
5: Fist of Destiny. Lantern flames quiver as Hiro Tanaka faces rival Wei Zhang. Every strike shatters the air in slow, thunderous impact.
6: High Noon Revenge. A tumbleweed rolls between Cole Maddox and outlaw Silas Boone. The dusty street freezes in silence.
7: Midnight Alley. A lamppost glow cuts the rain. Jack Sullivan watches as Vivian Cross steps from the shadows.
8: Color Clash. Lana Rivers snaps into pose, colors exploding behind. Panels shift in CMYK blocks.
9: Cosmic Riffs. Axel Stormstrums and the stage dissolves into galaxies. Stars bend to the music as Nova Blaze and Orion Cade join in.
10: Terror from the Swamp. Green fog boils. Clara Monroe runs as a behemoth rises from black waters.
11: Eternal Guardians. A shield of light blazes as Adrian Cross stands firm. Allies bracing behind.
12: Shadows of Vengeance. Storm clouds churn as Damien Vane stalks a rooftop edge. Lightning flickers.
13: Starbound Legacy. In cosmic fire, Kaelin Drax meets villain Vera Kael. Fleets burn in nebula haze.
14: Turbo Fury. Engines scream. Dante Cruz, Maya Storm, Rico Valdez leap airborne in neon blaze.
15: Wonderville.Lumi Spark races with friends Pip, Zara, and Milo into a candy-bright square of banners and balloons. Marky letters twinkle, adventure begins here, magic for every family.
20: Lumina. A bioluminescent jungle glows alive. Naravera brushes glowing ferns, creatures weaving trails of light.
41: Crown of Fire. Knights clash as dragons circle a burning sky. A crown glows in flame.
